author: Nectar Gan, CNN
title: China lifts 76-day lockdown on Wuhan, as city reemerges from coronavirus crisis
description: China has ended its lockdown of Wuhan, the original epicenter of the coronavirus crisis, as the city reemerges from a deadly outbreak that is now raging across the globe.
content:
(CNN)China has ended its lockdown of Wuhan, the original epicenter of the coronavirus crisis, as the city reemerges from a deadly outbreak that is now raging across the globe.
